TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BindableAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class BindableAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class BindableAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定成员是否通常用于绑定。

span.span: Specifies whether a member is typically used for binding.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以为多个成员，通常是属性，在控件上指定此属性。You can specify this attribute for multiple members, typically properties, on a control. 如果属性已标记有设置为`true`，则应为该属性引发属性更改通知。If a property has been marked with the set to `true`, then a property change notification should be raised for that property. 这意味着，如果属性是，则支持双向数据绑定。This means that if the property is , then two-way data binding is supported. 如果是，仍可以绑定到属性，但它应不会显示在默认的属性集以将绑定到，因为它可能或可能不会引发属性更改通知。If is , you can still bind to the property, but it should not be shown in the default set of properties to bind to, because it might or might not raise a property change notification. > [!NOTE] > 标记与某个属性时设置为`true`，此属性的值设置为常量成员。When you mark a property with set to `true`, the value of this attribute is set to the constant member . 为某一属性标记与设置为`false`，值是。For a property marked with the set to `false`, the value is . 因此，若要检查在代码中的此属性的值，必须指定属性作为或。Therefore, to check the value of this attribute in your code, you must specify the attribute as or . > [!CAUTION] > 只能在设计时，可以使用此属性。You can use this attribute at design time only. 你可以随意从绑定到任何属性在运行时。Nothing prevents you from binding to any property during run time. 有关更多信息，请参阅[特性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将适当地将数据绑定到属性标记。The following code example marks a property as appropriate to bind data to. [!code-cpp[Classic BindableAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindableAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindableAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindableAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindableAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindableAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何检查的值为`MyProperty`。The next code example shows how to check the value of the for `MyProperty`. 首先，代码获取的对象的所有属性。First, the code gets a with all the properties for the object. 接下来，代码索引获取`MyProperty`。Next, the code indexes into the to get `MyProperty`. 最后，该代码会返回此属性的属性，并将它们保存到特性变量中。Finally, the code returns the attributes for this property and saves them in the attributes variable. 此代码示例介绍两种不同的方式，要检查的值。The code example presents two different ways to check the value of the . 在第二个代码段中，该示例调用方法。In the second code fragment, the example calls the method. 在最后一个代码段中，该示例使用属性要检查的值。In the last code fragment, the example uses the property to check the value. [!code-cpp[Classic BindableAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindableAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindableAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindableAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic BindableAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindableAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#2)] 如果你将类标记为，使用下面的代码示例要检查的值。If you marked a class with the , use the following code example to check the value. [!code-cpp[Classic BindableAttribute Example#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindableAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindableAttribute Example#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindableAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Classic BindableAttribute Example#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindableAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标记与某个属性时设置为`true`，此属性的值设置为常量成员。When you mark a property with the set to `true`, the value of this attribute is set to the constant member . 为某一属性标记与设置为`false`，值是。For a property marked with the set to `false`, the value is . 因此，若要检查在代码中的此属性的值，必须指定属性作为或。Therefore, to check the value of this attribute in your code, you must specify the attribute as or . ## Examples 下面的代码示例将适当地将数据绑定到属性标记。The following code example marks a property as appropriate to bind data to. 此代码示例创建一个新，将其值设置为，并将其绑定到属性。This code example creates a new , sets its value to , and binds it to the property. value.span: 如果该属性通常用于绑定，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例将检查以确定是否`MyProperty`是可绑定。The following code example checks to see whether `MyProperty` is bindable. 代码首先获取的属性`MyProperty`通过执行以下操作：First the code gets the attributes for `MyProperty` by doing the following: - 检索的对象的所有属性。Retrieving a with all the properties for the object. - 索引获取`MyProperty`。Indexing into the to get `MyProperty`. - 特性变量中保存此属性的特性。Saving the attributes for this property in the attributes variable. 然后，代码设置`myAttribute`为的值中并检查是否可绑定属性。Then, the code sets `myAttribute` to the value of the in the and checks whether the property is bindable. 若要运行此代码示例，你必须提供完全限定程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定程序集名称的信息，请参阅For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [程序集名称](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。[Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). [!code-cpp[Classic BindableAttribute.Bindable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindableAttribute.Bindable Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindableAttribute.Bindable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindableAttribute.Bindable Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindableAttribute.Bindable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindableAttribute.Bindable Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标记具有此值的属性时被设置为常量成员。When you mark a property with this value, the is set to the constant member . 因此，如果你想要检查是否将该属性设置为你的代码中的此值，你必须指定属性作为。Therefore, when you want to check whether the attribute is set to this value in your code, you must specify the attribute as .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字段是默认设置。The field is the default setting for the . 标记与某个属性时构造函数的值的`false,`此属性的值设置为常量成员。When you mark a property with the constructor of the value `false,` the value of this attribute is set to the constant member . 因此，若要检查是否将属性设置为你的代码中的此值，必须指定属性作为。Therefore, to check whether the attribute is set to this value in your code, you must specify the attribute as .
